Exclusive.
& Premium.
Trades.

Trade forex, stocks & indices, cryptocurrencies, and commodities on Bev FX Live Trading Platform.

Sharp Prices,24x7 trading,100+ Tradable Assets

Start Trading

Markets

Touch to expand

Cryptocurrency

Trade the price movements
of natural resources that are central
to the world’s economy and make
the most of the market action.

Forex

Benefit from round-the-clock
trading hours (Monday to Friday),
high liquidity, low barriers
to entry, a wide range of offerings,
and opportunities to trade on world events.

Stocks

Trade global stocks Trade global stocks
of your favourite
household brands and international stock
market indices.

Commodities

Speculate on the price
movements of silver, gold,
oil and more. Profit from
the price difference when the
market moves in the direction
that you have predicted.

Trade types

Trade the way you want with 3 flexible trade types.

 

CFDs

Trade with leverage and low spreads for better returns on successful trades.

Trade Now

Multipliers

Multiply your potential profit without risking more than your stake.

Trade Now

Options

Earn fixed payouts by predicting asset price movements.

Trade Now

Complete package for every trader

FOREX TRADING

Benefit from industry-leading entry prices

  • High End Service for ultra fast trade execution
  • Three decades of trading know-how
  • Trade on the go
  • Highly-regarded trader education
  • Advanced risk management
  • Award-winning customer service*
  • Low minimum deposit
Register

CRYPTO TRADING

Opportunity to invest in only viable and profitable coins. 

  • High-yield ultra fast trade execution
  • Best selection of profitable coins to trade. 
  • Trade on the go
  • Highly-regarded trader education
  • Advanced risk management
  • Award-winning customer service*
  • Low minimum deposit
Login

BINARY OPTIONS

Receive even tighter spreads and commissions

  • Award-winning trading platform
  • Wide range of charting tools
  • Fast, automated execution
  • Expert news & analysis
  • Integrated with Signals 100+ Indicators
  • Build-in economic calender
  • Advanced trading tools
Contact Support

What our clients say about Us

Weekend trades, fast deposits & withdrawals, plus synthetics trading - what’s better than this?

Angie

This is the best broker I have ever come across!

Mathew

The P2P system makes withdrawals and deposits simple, it’s the best user-friendly app.

Sydney

My experience so far is just awesome! You can do instant buying and selling, and I hope to continue enjoying using the crypto payments. Keep up the good work!

Jack

I have never seen a platform that is so flexible with multiple resources that meet everyone’s needs. If that’s not enough, They are second to none on customer support services!

Anna

Excellent and reliable services; tested and trusted!

Isaac

This is the most reliable broker - excellent customer support and fast payments. It’s a great platform for commodities, forex, and synthetics trading.

Simon

It's the best broker in the world. I will recommend it to anyone every day all the time. Their support agents are really helpful in all areas.

Franc

I've been a trader for many years, and I've never encountered a good broker like them before – it's the best for customer care and payment options!

Jack

It's been a really great experience trading forex and crypto it's a smooth and seamless operation!

Vic

Hassle-free deposits and withdrawals

Enjoy the best trading conditions, start now. 

Register
Login

Cryptocurrency

Trade the price movements
of natural resources that are central
to the world’s economy and make
the most of the market action.

Forex

Benefit from round-the-clock
trading hours (Monday to Friday),
high liquidity, low barriers
to entry, a wide range of offerings,
and opportunities to trade on world events.

Commodities

Speculate on the price
movements of silver, gold,
oil and more. Profit from
the price difference when the
market moves in the direction
that you have predicted.

Stocks

Trade global stocks Trade global stocks
of your favourite
household brands and international stock
market indices.

Our Offers are effortlessly low

In its most basic sense, the forex market has been around for centuries, now cryptocurrencies are winning major grounds as well. Our platform allows you to trade both and also other instruments.

The foreign exchange market is where currencies are traded. Currencies are important because they allow us to purchase goods and services locally and across borders. International currencies need to be exchanged to conduct foreign trade and business.

If you are living in the United States and want to buy cheese from France, then either you or the company from which you buy the cheese has to pay the French for the cheese in euros (EUR). This means that the U.S. importer would have to exchange the equivalent value of U.S. dollars (USD) for euros.

Never miss an opportunity to follow WTI and Brent Crude price movements with our global market news and analysis. We have a team of experienced research analysts who follow markets 24/7 worldwide.

Why traders choose to trade with us

We are a reliable and trusted online trading broker, a few of our unmatched features includes:

We're Certified

We’re a certified organization that trades cryptocurrency and registered with legal bodies. 

We're Profitable

You can choose from our variety of packages and start making profit within days or even years. 

We're Secure

We use modern technologies to encrypt and secure user data. transactions are monitored with blockchain. 

We Accept Crypto

We accept bitcoin and ethereum. You can also use your card for payments and initiate trade. 

Best Support

We have the best support team and resolve issues within minutes. Our live chat team is unbeatable. 

We're Global

We have successfully taken over 77 countries which includes parts of Africa, Asia and Europe. 

PLATFORM FEATURES

$500

$11,444,851

INVESTMENT PACKAGES

$31,132,011

TOTAL WITHDRAWN
